programme.title: Nwadiuto
programme.desc: After refusing to allow her daughter to perform a mandated ritual, a mother loses her life protecting her. Her death ignites chaos, leading wives to fight against the tradition.

programme.title: Mmachi
programme.desc: Mmachis lover, Jude, comes to ask for her hand in marriage, but she turns him down because of her elder sister.

programme.title: Anya Mmiri
programme.desc: Unable to conceive, a young woman endures cruel torment from her mother-in-law. Just when it seems shes broken beyond repair, a shocking twist changes everything.

programme.title: Nwunye Eze
programme.desc: After years of marriage and no children, a young woman discovers her husbands infertility. Determined, she seeks ways to have children, defying the odds to build a family.

programme.title: Gbogbo Lowo
programme.desc: After trying a variety of professions but consistently failing at them, Dunni must find out at all cost, the source of her failures

programme.title: Mewa N Sele
programme.desc: A family tolerates their troublesome tenant whos husband is an ex-lover of the landlady. A visit after the birth of the neighbours newborn soon becomes their nightmare.

programme.title: Olulaja
programme.desc: A chronic womanizer finds himself in a romantic entanglement with a lady who finally changes his perception of women, including his mother whom he openly detests.

programme.title: Ore Mi
programme.desc: A young man celebrates his success as he acknowledges his mentor and bosom friends contribution. This relationship is soon thrown in a vengeful quest driven by betrayal.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A governorship aspirants noble mission is tainted by the ambitions of an exclusive mens club and her personal life. Its a well-known house of cards.

programme.title: Jigi
programme.desc: Jigi is a travel documentary series that showcases tourist spots and locations across Nigeria

programme.title: Nibolowa
programme.desc: A double-minded wife and husbands marriage goes through tremendous turmoil until when one unexpected visit rewrites the bliss and blisters ahead of them.

programme.title: Vindictive
programme.desc: A young lady experiences a tragedy that costs her two years and her beloved father as fate ushers her to a victimizer whom she starts a promising affair with.

programme.title: Ayanmo
programme.desc: A mans incompetence to fulfill his desire causes him to defile his destiny. His resolve leads to the disclosure of a shocking past as there is more to his life story.

programme.title: Laide
programme.desc: Two lovers are on a desperate quest to make as much money as possible but the mission comes with an unusual step from conspiracy to betrayal.

programme.title: Jesibeli
programme.desc: The household of God is under attack. This time, an unknown force targets the weakness of its members - Lust. What will it take to overcome this enemy?

programme.title: Ifa
programme.desc: A husband realizes his sister-in-laws alter ego and is led into a temptous move on her where is told not all freebies must be had.

programme.title: Salon
programme.desc: Sweet Profit: An unstable client keeps returning to Aunty Sholas salon. When Shola finally lets her in, she discovers the woman holds far more power than she ever imagined.

programme.title: Eri Ife
programme.desc: Four childhood friends maintain their bond over time with marital dreams that later threatens to shatter what seem to connect them all.

programme.title: Ise Ona Ni Ile Yoruba
programme.desc: This is a documentary showcasing Artisans who have perfected their talents in various arts and craft, and have devoted their time and energy to producing one-of-a-kind, handcrafted goods.

programme.title: Iyunade
programme.desc: What begins as a picture-perfect romance quickly goes south after the husband uncovers a dark and hidden chapter from his wifes past, one she had buried and hoped would never resurface.

programme.title: Seran Seran
programme.desc: A young man finds hope in falling in love with an older woman, a relationship that soon leads to chaos when it meets rejection. Watch how the drama unfolds.

programme.title: Square One
programme.desc: Two young lovers were sternly forewarned about their love affair due to the abiku syndrome. They disobeyed all warnings and now have to dance to the tune of their own unpleasant songs.

programme.title: Ojo Kan
programme.desc: Two drug cartels are at war, driven by confusion as two ladies set off on a vengeful quest. A vengeful quest that takes a suspenseful turn.

programme.title: Moranti
programme.desc: Three siblings strive to make ends meet. Their breakthrough comes through a promising long journey that tests their bond. Watch how this unfolds.

programme.title: Murewa
programme.desc: Toyosi invites her best friend Murewa who is just returning to Nigeria after spending many years abroad to spend some time with her and her family

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A governorship aspirants noble mission is tainted by the ambitions of an exclusive mens club and her personal life. Its a well-known house of cards.

programme.title: Jigi
programme.desc: Jigi is a travel documentary series that showcases tourist spots and locations across Nigeria

programme.title: Kishi Kiye
programme.desc: Kiishi lets bad advice affect her relationship with her twin sister who loves her dearly. The consequences of her actions may be too grave for her to bear.

programme.title: Bidemi Jagba
programme.desc: Determined to help her sister go through school, a young lady takes to petty crime. She lands a mouth watering offer that soon threatens all she has worked for.

programme.title: Awa Marun
programme.desc: Five girls went on vacation but only four of them came back alive. See what happened in this thriller?

programme.title: Subjection
programme.desc: A mother is caught up in an abusive relationship over her total dependence on her husband and his decisions. Things change when their daughter gets a new teacher.

programme.title: Ojiji Okan
programme.desc: A young woman is haunted by the shadows of her past live, leaving her emotionally scarred. She then crosses paths with a young man who falls in love with her.

programme.title: Okin
programme.desc: A ladys beauty becomes her reason to act disrespectful and turns down advances in her bid to find the ideal man of her choice. How does this end?

programme.title: Eri Ife
programme.desc: Four childhood friends maintain their bond over time with marital dreams that later threatens to shatter what seem to connect them all.

programme.title: Ise Ona Ni Ile Yoruba
programme.desc: This is a documentary showcasing Artisans who have perfected their talents in various arts and craft, and have devoted their time and energy to producing one-of-a-kind, handcrafted goods.

programme.title: Firesola
programme.desc: Firesola loves her husband so much even in the midst of domestic violence. She returns home one day and meets her husband in a pool of his own blood.

programme.title: Eni Akoko
programme.desc: A young lady meets her first client in a hook-up that soon turns to benevolence. This soon takes a turn as she finds herself battling for life.

programme.title: Asiri Mewa
programme.desc: A man gets kidnapped and instead of the kidnappers calling his family for ransom, they order the man to call his home and tell his wife his hidden secrets.

programme.title: Eri Ife
programme.desc: Eri Ife must live with her overbearing stepmother and sister after her mothers death, while hiding herself from their plots.

programme.title: Batiwaye
programme.desc: A family experiences a series of downfall and terrible losses but after a long time of ill luck, they see light at the end of the tunnel.

programme.title: Emilokan
programme.desc: A young lady resorts to inflicting severe pain on her husband but this comes with denial. Watch this thriller and how it all ends

programme.title: Adehun
programme.desc: A story of two bosom friends, one a pastor while the other is a robber who work together. See how this their relationship boomerang.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, a police officer teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Breaking News
programme.desc: A botched police stand-off with a gang of criminals is captured by TV cameras and broadcast live on TV, adding to the woes of the police attempting to nail these bad guys!

programme.title: Seven Warriors
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Guangxi, a group of villagers threatened by bandits hires seven warriors to stop the bandits tyranny, and team up to defeat the bandits in the end.

programme.title: Kungfu Cyborg: Metallic Attraction
programme.desc: An advanced cyborg cop is created as a crime fighter for the villagers in 2046. It can overcome most challenges except for love and battling a rogue cyborg.

programme.title: Helios
programme.desc: When the notorious criminal, Helios steals a powerful weapon from South Korea and attempts to sell it in Hong Kong, the police forces of these two lands must join hands.

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: A special agent from the Japanese National Security teams up with a skilled thief to find a pair of plates used to make counterfeit USD.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fas mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: Monkey King emerges after Goddess Nuwas sacrifice to challenge the Jade Emperor, causing chaos that enables Buffalo Demon to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: The Most Wanted
programme.desc: A botched police raid leads to a suspected betrayal of an undercover cop. As he is put on the most wanted list by both police and the triad, can he prove his innocence?

programme.title: Fire of Conscience
programme.desc: Detective Manfred teams up with Inspector Kee to investigate a homicide. As corruption surfaces, Manfred unravels a web of deceit that puts the Hong Kong Police Force at risk.

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: An undercover police officer teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a powerful drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Widow Warriors
programme.desc: When the men in a triad family are betrayed and gunned down by a rival gang, their wives decide to take revenge for the death of their husbands.

programme.title: The Fortune Code
programme.desc: Set in World War II, a secret agent is tasked with the mission to rescue Mammon, who knows the code to a $500 billion fund for the Chinese army.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Adapted from real events, the story is about a police special team fighting underground criminal organizations with wit and bravery, finally wiping out the enemy.

programme.title: Zu: Warriors From Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A young warrior teams up with his master and a band of heroes to find two celestial swords, so as to fight the Blood Demon seeking to wreak havoc upon the world.

programme.title: 3AM The Office
programme.desc: A newcomer offends the ghosts in his office on his first day at work and experiences spooky encounters during night shifts, making him reflect on his behaviour.

programme.title: The Last Blood
programme.desc: The Dalai Lama and Bees girlfriend are injured by the Red Army. Bee must find the only 3 donors with rare blood type P in 12 hours and fight against the terrorists to save them.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei becomes a VR fighter with a newly invented armour from a technology firm. When some armed men break into the firm, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, imperial guard Ocean secretly frees a kind monster gifted by Brunei, sparking a palace bounty and a frantic hunt to capture it.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: An accomplished cop who sinks into a deep depression after his wife was killed, is forced to return to action when a former cop is implicated in a murder case.

programme.title: Motorway
programme.desc: On the streets of Hong Kong, an arrogant rookie cop and his veteran partner confront a legendary getaway driver, using their cars as weapons in a high stakes showdown.

programme.title: Bullets Over Summer
programme.desc: Two unorthodox and reckless detectives who use a demented grannys apartment as a stakeout end up developing romantic relationships with her neighbours.

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: When an important witness and his family are brutally murdered, a furious and disillusioned lawyer decides to dish out his own vigilante justice with his fist.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Tiger Cage III
programme.desc: Two cops investigate the shady dealings of a rich businessman but are set up and assaulted. As they uncover the mastermind behind, the final showdown becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: Zhen Xin befriends You Mei in the University and constantly hears strange noises in the dormitory. When she was attacked, You Mei saved her and You Meis identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of police officers uncovers their seniors involvement in an illegal plot after a drug operation raid. They vow to bring them to justice and root out corruption.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: A skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world must return to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Shanghai
programme.desc: A laborer moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but has to use his kung fu skills to survive, as well as to take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.desc: A military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and re-connects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the Air Force watchdog assigned to him.

programme.desc: Its the Pearsons versus the aliens who came from upstairs, in an all-out battle that will decide the fate of the Earth - and kick-off the ultimate summer vacation.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: A lawyer blinded by radioactive waste fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero, using his other senses, which have been enhanced.

programme.desc: In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, FBI agent Malcolm Turner is tasked with a covert operation of disguising as an overweight elderly woman.

programme.desc: FBI agent, Malcolm Turner, reprises his disguise as an old lady to become a nanny in order to expose Tom Fuller, the suspected designer of a deadly computer worm.

programme.desc: FBI agent Malcolm Turner and his stepson Trent go undercover at an all-girls performing arts school after Trent witnesses a murder.

programme.desc: Two teens with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, though their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.
